arts.sum: Frustrated Fulham boss Marco Silva says his side's draw with struggling Southampton is a "missed opportunity" to climb higher in the Premier League table.

arts.ttl: Marco Silva bemoans â€˜missed opportunityâ€™ as Fulham held by Southampton
arts.sum: The Cottagers have now won only once in their last six Premier League matches.

arts.ttl: Southampton can build confidence after 'excellent' draw - Rusk
arts.sum: Southampton caretaker manager Simon Rusk says he is "delighted" with his side's performance in their 0-0 draw.

arts.ttl: Southampton draw at Fulham as Juric watches on
arts.sum: Southampton secured a point away from home for only the second time this season as they held hosts Fulham to a goalless draw at Craven Cottage on Sunday.

arts.ttl: 'Fascinates me': Jamie Carragher already has one criticism of Ivan Juric after Fulham 0-0 Southampton
Juric watches on as Saints frustrate Fulham
arts.sum: Fulham missed out on the chance to move into the Premier League's top six after being held to a goalless draw by a Southampton side being watched in the Craven Cottage stands by new manager Ivan Juric.

arts.ttl: Ivan Juric watches on as solid Southampton claim point at Fulham
arts.sum: It turns out it wasnâ€™t so hard after all. Southampton stopped giving the ball away in their own half, adopted an approach rooted in expediency and kept their second clean sheet of the campaign. Salvation remains a long way distant but a point, only the second they have taken away from home, means there is at least something to build on in the post-Russell Martin era. Southamptonâ€™s new coach Ivan Juric, who signed an 18-month contract on Friday, was in the stand at Craven Cottage, peering through the bitter rain driving down the Thames as Simon Rusk conducted affairs from the dugout. What he oversaw was 90 minutes of very little, which from a Southampton point of view must have come as a welcome change. Even the arrival, for his league debut, of the Fulham winger Martial Godo, for which everybody has been waiting, failed to bring anything approaching resolution. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Fulham 0-0 Southampton: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Aaron Ramsdale stars in stalemate
arts.sum: Fulham fail to capitalise on dominance over toothless Southampton as Cottagers are held to a 0-0 draw in the Premier League on Sunday afternoon.
Fulham draw. The post Fulham held by struggling Southampton appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: New Southampton boss Ivan Juric watches goalless stalemate at Fulham
arts.sum: Juric, who signed an 18-month contract at St Maryâ€™s earlier this week, watched from the stands as his new side picked up a much-needed point.
